ComicInfo.Summary:
The zombie animal infection spreads across Louisiana, as Tommy and Azrael struggle to survive and President Obama is forced to go toe-to-toe with the un-deadly animals! Join all-star creators Kevin Eastman (TMNT), Joshua Ortega (Gears of War), and Digger T Mesch (Agent 88) for the third installment of the year's most talked-about new zombie book!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Reg | Regular Cover | Sam Shearon | 1 | RI | Retailer Incentive Cover | Shane White | Missing | Sub | Subscription Cover | Kevin Eastman (a), David Millgate (a) & Blond (c) | 2 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-26 19:00:10. [CVDB433204]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: David Millgate, Kevin Eastman, Qing Ping Mui, Sam Shearon, Shane White
